Based on the user's interest in romantic movies set in Notting Hill, I would recommend the film "Notting Hill" directed by Richard Gere and Julia Roberts.

The movie is based on a true story about an American writer named William Smith who writes about romantic relationships. 

William Smith had a crush on a beautiful young woman named Julia Roberts from Kentucky. 

One day in Notting Hill, London, William Smith saw Julia Roberts walking down the street. 

William Smith was so captivated by Julia Roberts that he stopped walking and started talking to her. 

Julia Roberts was so surprised and flattered by William Smith's attention that she started talking back to him as well. 

William Smith was so enchanted by Julia Roberts' beauty, grace, and wit that he couldn't stop thinking about her and dreaming of the wonderful romantic relationship they could have together in the future.
